name: Gambit Games
description:
Join a community of strategy gamers and play your way to the top of the leaderboards to claim the title of ‘Genius Gamer’! Play in lots of games simultaneously and get notified when its your turn to move. Play at your own pace against thousands of players from around the world! Choose from one of the games below or let us know what game you'd like to see on the Gambit platform!

BACKGAMMON
- One of the oldest known two-player board games, enjoy this timeless race to remove all of your pieces from the board!

WORLD WAR
- It’ll take more than luck to wipe out your opponents and conquer the world in this original adaption of the classic board game, Risk!

BITNOPOLY
- Our twist on the classic game Monopoly. Compete with your friends to become the last player standing to take home the victory!

OH SHIP!
- Dive into this psychological game of warfare and race to sink your opponent’s ships before they sink yours!

YATZY
- Test your luck (and learn when to cut your losses) with up to 6 players in this game of chance, risk, and reward!
